name: Papercut Art Gallery-Nature
description:
Welcome to "Paper Art Gallery," an artistic puzzle game inspired by the art of paper cutting. Your task is to piece together fragments of paper cutouts to restore the nature-themed artworks in the gallery.

----- Game Features ------

- 32 nature-themed paper cut artworks
- Immersive puzzle experience
- Comfortable and relaxing ambient music
- Simple controls
- Moderately challenging levels

----- Game Controls ------

- Hold the left mouse button to move a puzzle piece
- Click the right mouse button to rotate a puzzle piece
- Press the R key to rotate the held puzzle piece
- Press the ESC key to hide or show the game UI

------------------------
